nodes.text: Thermal detonators were palm-sized, spherical devices that were used as extremely deadly explosive weapons. In addition to being surprisingly powerful for their size, they could only be deactivated by whomever turned them on. They would only explode when they were activated, and therefore a secure and stable weapon to carry.

The Duros bounty hunter Cad Bane carried thermal detonators, and often used them during assignments. Princess Leia Organa, disguised as a bounty hunter, threatened the crime lord Jabba the Hutt with a detonator in order to negotiate a deal.
